thread.title: U.S. job gains smallest in 6 months

title: U.S. job gains smallest in 6 months
text:
U.S. job gains smallest in 6 months 8:55pm IST - 01:10 
The U.S. economy added 103,000 jobs in March as wage growth picked up. As Fred Katayama reports, a return to seasonably cold weather depressed job growth. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
